name: Wild Living
description: Expansion mod that brings more life and variety to the wilds. Merged with Dried Fruits mod by Wayticus as well. Includes tons of new items with recipes for enhanced wild living along with an ability to dry fruits, an ability to grow various trees via planting them conveniently along with a revamped, improved tree farm location with some new tropical trees. Link to original - https://github.com/LambdaSix/Wild-Living
